SEARCH
Module PIXL.POS
Package teampixl.com.pixlpos.common

Class GuiCommon

java.lang.Object
teampixl.com.pixlpos.common.GuiCommon
Direct Known Subclasses:
CookScreenController, LoginScreenController, WaiterScreenController
public class GuiCommon extends Object
Utility class for common GUI operations in the application. This class provides methods to load different stages and scenes using FXML files.

    • loadStage

      public static void loadStage(String fxmlPath, String title)
      Loads a new stage with the given FXML file and title.
      Parameters:
      fxmlPath - the path to the FXML file
      title - the title of the stage

    • loadScene

      public static void loadScene(String fxmlPath, String title, javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      Loads a new scene into the given stage using the specified FXML file and title.
      Parameters:
      fxmlPath - the path to the FXML file
      title - the title of the stage
      stage - the stage to set the scene on

    • loadScene

      public static void loadScene(String fxmlPath, String title, javafx.stage.Stage stage, int width, int height)
      Loads a new scene into the given stage using the specified FXML file, title, and dimensions.
      Parameters:
      fxmlPath - the path to the FXML file
      title - the title of the stage
      stage - the stage to set the scene on
      width - the width of the scene
      height - the height of the scene

    • loadScene

      public static void loadScene(String fxmlPath, String title, javafx.scene.Node node)
      Loads a new scene into the stage associated with the given node.
      Parameters:
      fxmlPath - the path to the FXML file
      title - the title of the stage
      node - a node from the current scene

    • loadScene

      public static void loadScene(String fxmlPath, String title, javafx.scene.Node node, int width, int height)
      Loads a new scene into the stage associated with the given node, with specified dimensions.
      Parameters:
      fxmlPath - the path to the FXML file
      title - the title of the stage
      node - a node from the current scene
      width - the width of the scene
      height - the height of the scene

    • openModalWindow

      public static void openModalWindow(String fxmlPath, String title, javafx.stage.Stage owner)
      Opens a new modal window with the specified FXML file and title.
      Parameters:
      fxmlPath - the path to the FXML file
      title - the title of the window
      owner - the owner window for the modal dialog
